author: Diana Bruk
title: People Are Furious Over This Photo Of Ivanka Trump In The Oval Office

locations.name: ivanka trump in the oval office

text:
Everything That Happened at the Kylie Pop-Up Shop This Photo Of Ivanka Trump In The Oval Office Is Proving Controversial 
A lot of people think Ivanka needs to take a seat, except not the one she's sat in already. Ivanka Trump/Twitter By Diana Bruk Feb 15, 2017 On Tuesday, Ivanka joined her father, President Donald Trump, in welcoming Canadian Prime Minister and full-time Hugh Grant-lookalikeJustin Trudeau to the White House for his first meeting with Easy D. Wonderful meeting with Canadian PM @JustinTrudeau and a group of leading CEO's & business women from CanadaðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦and the United StatesðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ pic.twitter.com/Rxr31QpxMK â€” Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 13, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Their get-together â€” the first council meeting for a new U.S./Canadian organization working towards "advancing women in business" â€” gave us all this amazing photo of Ivanka looking thirsty AF while looking at international dreamboat Trudeau. She's thinking about maple syrup, you just know it. Getty People were even less amused, though, when Ivanka shared a photo on her social media accounts that showed her sitting in the Oval Office in a chair that is generally reserved for the president, and the president only. A post shared by Ivanka Trump (@ivankatrump) on Feb 13, 2017 at 2:35pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A lot of people thought it was extremely inappropriate. @IvankaTrump it's inappropriate for you to be in those meetings and seated at that desk. You are not the POTUS
